scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.build:web: export NODE_ENV=mainnet && rm -rf mainnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist mainnet
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:contract && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.prestart: npm run build:contract:debug && npm run dev:deploy:contract
scripts.start: export PORT=38560 && echo The app is starting! It will automatically open in your browser when ready && env-cmd -f ./neardev/dev-account.env parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.dev: export PORT=38560 && nodemon --watch contract/src -e rs --exec "npm run start"
scripts.test:contract: npm run build:contract:debug && cd contract && cargo test -- --nocapture && cd .. && jest test --runInBand
scripts.build:web:testnet: export NODE_ENV=testnet && rm -r testnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist testnet
scripts.build:web:all: export NODE_ENV=mainnet && rm -r mainnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist mainnet && export NODE_ENV=testnet && rm -r testnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist testnet
scripts.test1: cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet && cross-env REACT_CONTRACT_ID=dev-1627303090343-79183490719853 jest rest-api.test.js -t 'Tip FT' --useStderr --verbose false
